name: Train Rpg Thing (WIP)
description:
An rpg about being stuck on a cursed train 

-My first game! 

-So far its just a bad prototype that isnt even related to the story!  A proper Demo will come out soon

- so far there is no fighting cuz I haven't figured that out yet

-GameDev is hard.
